page.description: The <OBJECT>.REFRESH_LAYOUT() method refreshes the layout, as if you had pressed F5 or selected Refresh Display from the menu. Attach the <OBJECT>.REFRESH_LAYOUT() method to the onactivate event to show changes to a form layout.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.view("Customer Information") ptr.Refresh_Layout()

section.description: If you need to resynchronize the data as well, then you will need a bit more, but the form needs to be in view mode.
section.example: parent.commit()'Makes sure form is in view mode parent.resync() parent.refresh_layout()
